utils package¶

Submodules¶

utils.plot_utils module¶

utils.plot_utils.visualize_correlation_per_window(plt_object, input_data_dictionary)[source]¶
utils.plot_utils.visualize_pyplot(cbr_fox_instance, **kwargs)[source]¶

Visualize the best cases’ components using Matplotlib. This method plots the components of the best cases, along with the forecasted window and prediction, to aid in visual analysis. Users can customize the appearance and behavior of the plots through Matplotlib configurations passed via kwargs.
